messages.content: You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing webpage content. Analyze the provided text and respond ONLY with a valid JSON object containing the requested field. Do not include any explanations or introductory text outside the JSON structure.

Analyze the following webpage content and generate a concise, one or two sentence description summarizing its main points.
Page Title: [Title]
Content: [Text content]

Format your response as a JSON object with a single 'description' field. Do not include explanations.

description.description: A one or two sentence summary of the page content.
